SA11n1127:1: tadevamugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitumaraṇyamāśrayaṇīyamiti sthitam |
SA11n1127:3: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇām ||
SA11n1127:4: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyamanuttarāṃ prāpsyati so'grabodhim ||
SA11n1127:5: ye kāma varjanti yathā'gnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇām |
SA11n1127:7: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsīdanāgato bheṣyati yo'vatiṣṭhate |
SA11n1127:8: yehi sthitaireva agāramadhye prāptā iyaṃ uttama agrabodhiḥ ||
SA11n1127:9: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vasedaraṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ |
SA11n1127:10: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajāmasaṃskṛtām || peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1127:11: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi |
SA11n1127:12: nnopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇa dharmān ||
SA11n1127:13: yaścaica bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sattvārtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ |
SA11n1127:14: araṇyābhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti ||
SA11n1127:15: yadi punarvisabhāgasattvānunayātpariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhādikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta,
SA11n1127:17: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti |
SA11n1127:18: mamāntike ceti praduṣṭacitta na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam ||
SA11n1127:19: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim |
SA11n1127:20: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevināpi puno'pi te bhonti amitrasaṃnibhāḥ ||
SA11n1127:21: na vijña bāleṣviha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim ||
SA11n1127:22: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānām ||
SA11n1127:23: sahadhārmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca |
SA11n1127:24: prāviṣkarontī imi bāladharmā imamartha vijñāya na viśvasanti ||
SA11n1127:25: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhya sārdham |
SA11n1127:26: vijñā punarvijñajanena sārdhaṃ samenti sarpiryatha sarpimaṇḍe ||
SA11n1127:28: sūsukhitāḥ sada te nara loke yeṣu priyāpriya nāsti kahiṃcit |
SA11n1127:29: ye ca na kandarake'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti ||
SA11n1127:30: yeṣu mamāpi tu nāsti kahiṃcit yeṣu parigrahu sarvaśu nāsti |
SA11n1127:31: khaṅgasamā vicarantimu lokaṃ gagane pavana yatheva vrajanti ||
SA11n1127:32: syuḥ sukhitā bata te nara loke yeṣa na sajjati mānasa loke |
SA11n1127:33: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣviha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriya vidyati saṅgo ||
SA11n1127:34: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo |
SA11n1127:35: anta ume api te hi eti jahitvā te sukhitā nara ye rata dharme ||
SA11n1127:37: bhavati satatamalpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇadoṣata sarvi varjayitvā |
SA11n1127:38: na vivadati kadāci yuktayogī imi guṇa tasya bhavantyaraṇyavāse ||
SA11n1127:39: saṃda bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahici loke |
SA11n1127:40: na ca bhavati vivṛddhirāstravāṇāṃ vana vasato'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ ||
SA11n1127:41: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sada upaśāntarato vivekacārī |
SA11n1127:42: vacasi manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahu guṇa tasya bhavantyaraṇyavāse ||
SA11n1127:43: bhavati ca anukūla tasya mokṣo laghupratividhyati so'dhimukti śāntām |
SA11n1127:44: vanicaridhimukti sevato'sya imi guṇa bhontyaraṇyavāsi sarve ||
SA11n1127:46: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu gatim |
SA11n1127:47: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram || iti ||
SA11n1127:51: na strīsaṃbhava naiva cāpi puruṣaisteṣāṃ kkacidvidyate
SA11n1127:53: lābhairnāpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyantyalābhairna ca
SA11n1127:57: yadi punaḥ śrutavānimāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadamāsādya lābhādau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet,
SA11n1127:58: sa evaikaḥ sadevake loke vañcitaḥ syāt ||
SA11n1127:59: uktaṃ hi āryaratnakūṭe- tadyathā kāśyapa kaścideva puruṣo mahatā udakārṇavenohyamāna udakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryāt evameva kāśyapa ihaike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmānudgṛhyaparyavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti,
SA11n1127:62: te mahatā dharmārṇavenohyamānāḥ kleśatṛṣṇayā kālagatā durgativinipātagāmino bhavantīti ||
SA11n1127:65: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe,
SA11n1127:66: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavantyacchāni śucīni nirmalānyalpāyāsāni sukhaparibhogāni |
SA11n1127:68: puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni patrasaṃpannānyapagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntānyadvitīyāni,
SA11n1127:70: sa teṣu sthāneṣvāśrito yadanena pūrvaṃ paṭhitaṃ bhavati,
SA11n1127:71: tat tribhī rātraistrirdivasasya svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatairindriyairna bahirgatena cittena prasādamupajīvan granthamupadhārayannimittānyudgṛhṇan middhamapakrāman |
SA11n1127:72: sacedāraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vā anye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ,
SA11n1127:74: evaṃ cānena vaktavyam- niṣīda mahārāja yathāprajñapta āsane |
SA11n1127:81: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti anupadrutāścaurabhaṭādibhiḥ |
SA11n1127:90: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ sat pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittamārādhayitum |
SA11n1127:91: te ca sattvāstasyāntike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhanta iti ||
SA11n1127:92: ugradattaparipṛcchāyāmapyāha- punaraparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisattvenāraṇye prativasatā evamupaparīkṣitavyam |
SA11n1127:95: bahavo'pyatra adāntā avinītā ayuktā anabhiyuktāḥ prativasanti |
SA11n1127:98: api tu khalu punarahaṃ yasyārthāya araṇye prativasāmi,
SA11n1127:99: sa mayā arthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yaduta śrāmaṇyārthaḥ ||
SA11n1127:101: punaraparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisattvena araṇye viharatā evamupaparīkṣitavyam-kimarthamahamaraṇyamāgataḥ?
SA11n1127:111: anitye nitya iti viparyāsabhayabhīto'nātmani ātmeti viparyāsabhayabhīto'śucau śuciriti viparyāsabhayabhīto duḥkhe sukhamiti viparyāsabhayabhītaḥ |
SA11n1127:113: satkāyadṛṣṭibhayabhītaḥ pāpamitrabhayabhīto lābhasatkārabhayabhīto'kālamantrabhayabhīto'dṛṣṭe dṛṣtamiti bhayabhīto'śrute śrutamiti bhayabhīto'mate matamiti bhayabhīto'vijñāte vijñātamiti bhayabhīto'śramaṇe śramaṇamadabhayabhīto'nyonyavidveṣaṇabhayabhītaḥ kāmadhāturūpadhātvarūpyadhātubhayabhītaḥ sarvabhavagatyupapattibhayabhīto nirayatiryagyonipitṛviṣayabhayabhītaḥ |
SA11n1127:117: punaraparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisattvenāraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ śikṣitavyam- yāni kānicidbhayānyutpadyante sarvāṇī,
SA11n1127:121: nātmābhiniveśaṃ nātmaparigrahaṃ nātmanidānaṃ nātmatṛṣṇāṃ nātmasaṃjñāṃ nātmavādopādānaṃ nātmadṛṣṭiṃ nātmādhiṣṭhānaṃ nātmaparikalpanāṃ nātmarakṣāṃ parityajeyam,
SA11n1127:123: api tu khalu punargṛhapate nāstyātmasaṃjñino'raṇyavāso nāsti parasaṃjñinaḥ ||
SA11n1127:127: tadyathā gṛhapate araṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati,
SA11n1127:131: evameva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisattvena araṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatikāṣṭhakuḍayavadātmapratibhāsavatsaṃjñākāye utpādayitavyā |
SA11n1127:135: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparikṣitavyaḥ _ nāstyatra kāye ātmā va sattvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā |
SA11n1127:138: tena yathā araṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ,
SA11n1127:139: evamevāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyameva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasaṃpadya vihartavyam |
SA11n1127:143: punaraparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisattvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa iti jñātvā araṇye vastavyam |
SA11n1127:148: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīśenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇaṃ bhavitavyamanalasena svayaṃkāriṇā aparopatāpinā |
SA11n1127:151: tathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasattvānām |
SA11n1127:161: putraratraivāha- sacetpunargṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisattvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko vā glanaparipṛcchako vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanamāgacchet,
SA11n1127:165: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yatsarvavastuṣvaraṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭayā cātṛptateti ||
SA11n1127:166: āryaratnarātrisūtre'pyuktam- yadi punarasya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyālamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ,
SA11n1127:167: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1127:172: yadyevamapi kṛtvā te vyālamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran,
SA11n1127:173: tena mayaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam- lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me asārātkāyātsāramādattaṃ bhavipyati |
SA11n1127:174: na punarime vyālamṛgāḥ śakyā mayā āmiṣeṇa toṣayitum |
SA11n1127:180: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśino devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣumupasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ tatra tenāraṇyakena yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1127:186: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadā adhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi |
SA11n1127:187: api tu pratibhātu te vayaṃ dhārmaśravaṇikā iti ||
SA11n1127:189: tena tatra araṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyam |
SA11n1127:196: na punaratra kaściddharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti ||
SA11n1127:197: punaścoktam- tena tatra araṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam- yadyapyahamaraṇyamāgata eko'dvitīyaḥ,
SA11n1127:198: na me kaścitsahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet |
SA11n1127:199: api tu khalu punaḥ santi me devanāgayakṣā buddhāśca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti |
